title: Toilet? Box with Cover
description:
Wooden toilet (?) box with separate cover. Flat circular base with body tapering slightly to rim. Circular, slightly convex cover fitting on collar of body. Lines incised around top and bottom of body and top cover. Center of cover pierced probably for knob now missing. 

Condition: Cover extensively chipped. Wood dry.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Fund

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
